rules.title: Dislocation Allowance Eligibility
rules.description: Member must have a PCS with a change of permanent station, be authorized to move dependents, and have a distance of 50+ miles.
rules.calculation: Based on rank and dependent status

rules.title: DLA Payment Rates FY2025
rules.description: Fixed payment amounts based on rank and dependent status

rules.title: Temporary Lodging Expense Eligibility
rules.description: TLE covers lodging and M&IE at origin and destination when member is unable to occupy permanent housing
rules.notes: Commander may authorize extension beyond 10 days

rules.title: TLE Reimbursement Calculation
rules.description: Actual lodging cost + per diem M&IE rate for locality
rules.calculation: Actual lodging receipts + locality per diem rate

rules.title: Mileage Allowance in Lieu of Transportation
rules.description: Member may drive POV instead of using government transportation and receive mileage reimbursement

rules.title: MALT Payment Calculation
rules.description: Official distance × $0.18 per mile. One rate for one or more POVs.
rules.notes: Rate applies whether traveling alone or with dependents, one or more vehicles

rules.title: Personally Procured Move Eligibility
rules.description: Member may move own HHG and receive 95% of government cost estimate

rules.title: PPM Payment Calculation
rules.description: Payment is 95% of what government would have paid
rules.notes: GCC based on weight, distance, and current transportation rates

rules.title: Weight Ticket Requirements
rules.description: Required: Empty weight ticket (before loading) and full weight ticket (after loading) from certified scale
rules.notes: Same vehicle must be weighed empty and full. Government vehicle (rental truck) weight tickets also accepted.

rules.title: HHG Weight Allowances by Rank
rules.description: Maximum weight authorized for shipment or PPM based on rank
rules.notes: With dependents, add 500 lbs per dependent (max 2,000 lbs additional)

rules.title: Per Diem During PCS Travel
rules.description: Member receives 75% of locality M&IE rate during authorized travel days

rules.title: Dependent Per Diem Rates
rules.description: Each dependent age 12+ receives 75% of member's per diem
rules.calculation: Member per diem × 0.75 × number of dependents

rules.title: Advance Operating Allowance
rules.description: Member may request advance payment up to 80% of estimated entitlements
rules.notes: Must be paid back if actual entitlements are less than advanced amount

rules.title: Savings Deposit Program Eligibility
rules.description: Service members in qualifying combat zones can deposit up to $10,000 and earn 10% annual interest
rules.notes: Accrues for up to 3 months after leaving combat zone

rules.title: House Hunting Trip Allowance
rules.description: One house hunting trip to new duty station for member and/or spouse

rules.title: Household Goods Storage
rules.description: Government pays for HHG storage when authorized

rules.title: Spouse Relocation Assistance
rules.description: Up to $1,000 reimbursement for spouse job hunting expenses

rules.title: Pet Transportation During PCS
rules.description: Up to $550 reimbursement for pet transportation costs
rules.notes: Introduced in 2024, covers shipping or travel costs

rules.title: Mobile Home Transportation
rules.description: Government pays for mobile home transportation in lieu of HHG shipment
rules.notes: Member must own mobile home and use as primary residence

rules.title: Privately Owned Vehicle Shipment
rules.description: Government pays for one POV shipment to/from OCONUS duty stations
rules.notes: CONUS to CONUS moves must drive or ship at own expense
